note: All strategies compiled from public guides and community posts; verify prices/routes after patches.

strategies.title: Contract Loop for Fast Solari
strategies.objective: Chain contracts from hubs for steady Solari with low risk.
steps: Pick 3–5 contracts in the same quadrant (Arrakeen/Harko hub boards).
Route across rock plateaus; avoid long dune crossings.
Turn in batches; rebuy consumables and repeat.
risks: PvP ambush at hand-in points; storm interruptions
notes: Contracts scale well before you unlock profitable crafts; great starter income.

strategies.title: CHOAM Exchange Flips
strategies.objective: Buy low and sell high on the player market (CHOAM).
steps: Track price trends for sought-after components and schematics.
Buy under average; relist at sustainable margins.
Claim purchases correctly from Exchange terminals.
risks: Market fees; price swings; liquidity risk
notes: Use Exchange when vendor prices cap profits; learn claim process to avoid lost items.

strategies.title: Radiation Suit Vendor Flip (Mk4/Mk5)
strategies.objective: Craft Radiation Suits and sell to NPC vendors for consistent Solari.
steps: Unlock and craft Radiation Suit Mk4/Mk5.
Sell at outposts noted for good buy prices; ensure high durability.
Compare multiple vendors; prices vary by wear and location.
requirements: Radiation Suit crafting unlock, fabricator access
risks: Price variation; mats might be more valuable on Exchange
notes: Community reports highlight Mk4/Mk5 suits as reliable vendor sales; durability affects payout.

strategies.title: Vehicle Parts Repair & Resale
strategies.objective: Loot or salvage vehicle parts, repair them, and sell to vendors.
steps: Collect damaged modules during wreck runs.
Use Repair Station to restore condition.
Sell at vendors known for vehicle part buy orders.
risks: Repair costs may outweigh resale if damage is severe
notes: Players report good payouts at specific outposts—verify prices on your shard.

strategies.title: Weekly Deep Desert Wreck Circuit
strategies.objective: Farm rotating wrecks and testing stations on weekly reset for unique drops and schematics.
steps: Consult up-to-date Deep Desert map for current POIs.
Fly to wrecks/testing stations during off-peak hours.
Extract quickly and stash before storms.
risks: High worm/PvP risk; storms; item loss on environmental deaths
notes: Tables rotate each reset—use live maps to optimize route and avoid dead POIs.

strategies.title: Shipwreck Sweep
strategies.objective: Run a sequence of known shipwrecks for chests and salvage.
steps: Use shipwreck location lists to plan a route spanning multiple wrecks.
Approach from rock ridgelines; avoid cresting dunes.
Empty packs at a hub before the next leg.
risks: Worm triggers during crate looting; PvP campers at popular wrecks
notes: Mix with Testing Station loop to balance risk and time.

strategies.title: Imperial Testing Station Priority
strategies.objective: Prioritize Testing Stations for high-value unique schematics.
steps: Target known station coordinates during low-traffic windows.
Bring radiation protection and repair supplies.
Exit via rock corridors to reduce worm risk.
risks: High enemy density; timers/rotations may change
notes: Testing Stations are top-tier for uniques—check current spawns.

strategies.title: Erythrite → Cobalt Paste → Mobility
strategies.objective: Mine Erythrite in Hagga Rift to craft cobalt paste used for major unlocks like the Ornithopter.
steps: Start at the Wreck of the Kytheria and sweep Riftwatch → Jabal Eifrit Al‑janub → Pinnacle Station.
Use Mk2+ Cutteray to gather crystals; pack healkits and weapons.
Craft cobalt paste back at base for key tech progression.
risks: Hostile mobs and tight canyons; dehydration risk
notes: A focused Erythrite run accelerates aerial mobility unlocks.

strategies.title: Trial of Aql Progression Route
strategies.objective: Complete the 8 Aql trials to unlock survival tech and extra skill slot.
steps: Follow regional order to minimize travel (Basin → Vermillius Gap → Rift → Shield Wall).
Prioritize trials that grant Crysknife, Stilltent, Thumper early.
Keep notes on solved riddle cues to help clanmates.
risks: Some trials offer no practical reward—don’t overcommit time mid-run
notes: Target reward-rich trials first for faster power spikes.

strategies.title: Outpost Clear → Scan Cycle
strategies.objective: Alternate outpost clears with probe scans to farm Intel safely.
steps: Clear one or two camps for burst Intel.
Run a scan loop while crafting/repairs complete.
Repeat to keep Intel flow steady without burnout.
risks: PvP at busy outposts; probe yield is slower but safer
notes: Balanced loop avoids stalls in research progression.

strategies.title: Sandwalking Night Crossings
strategies.objective: Use the player-found sandwalking technique at night to reduce worm triggers across long dune fields.
steps: Equip Softstep boots and a grappler.
Move in short, controlled steps; use grapples to skip longest gaps.
Abort on sustained vibration spikes; pivot to rock.
risks: Emergent technique may be altered by patches; practice before long hauls
notes: Use for loot runs where rock routes are scarce.

strategies.title: PvP: Rock Control & Exit Lanes
strategies.objective: Fight near rock to preserve exits and deny worm chaos.
steps: Anchor fights on plateau edges to maintain disengage options.
Avoid crest duels; pull opponents toward safe rock.
Use grapples for vertical resets between bursts.
risks: Low visibility storms can flip engagements
notes: Terrain discipline wins more fights than raw DPS in the dunes.

strategies.title: PvP: Meta Scan & Weapon Pairing
strategies.objective: Pair a long‑range precision option with a close‑range finisher and a shield‑breaking sidearm.
steps: Check current weapon tiers; carry one tool for each range band.
Rotate ammo types to match shields and targets.
Keep healkits on quick‑access; hydrate before commits.
requirements: Updated weapon tiers known to you
risks: Meta shifts with patches; respec lightly and test
notes: Holtzman shields and patch changes alter TTK—adapt loadouts.

strategies.title: Quick Loot: Hub‑Adjacent Circuit
strategies.objective: Hit 2–3 nearby POIs from a hub, stash, and repeat for safe, steady loot.
steps: Pick short routes with rock majority.
Loot fast; skip low‑value crates when meter is elevated.
Bank items frequently to avoid wipe losses.
risks: Lower payout than Deep Desert; safer for gearing
notes: Good while learning worm management and storms.

strategies.title: Exchange: Schematic Flips
strategies.objective: Flip high-demand schematics on CHOAM during peak demand windows.
steps: Track newly popular builds and items after patches.
Buy under median, relist with reasonable margins.
Avoid overexposure—rotate listings to reduce risk.
risks: Patch swings can crater prices; fees eat narrow margins
notes: Safer than PvP farming; diversify across 2–3 items.

strategies.title: Vendor Targeting: Weapons at Pinnacle
strategies.objective: Sell repaired weapons to vendors reputed to pay better for that category.
steps: Collect drops during outpost clears.
Repair at base, then sell at weapon-favoring outposts.
Compare quotes before bulk selling.
risks: Quotes vary by durability and location
notes: Community thread notes Pinnacle for weapons; confirm on your shard.

strategies.title: Route: Wrecks → Stations
strategies.objective: Run shipwrecks first, then testing stations to empty bag space where it matters most.
steps: Plot a path hitting 2–3 wrecks from the edge inward.
Bank or scrap low‑value loot before stations.
Finish at a station to maximize high‑value capacity.
risks: Storms and PvP campers near interiors
notes: Stations often drop uniques—reserve inventory.

strategies.title: Off‑Peak Deep Desert Runs
strategies.objective: Schedule Deep Desert loops during low-population hours.
steps: Check your server’s peak windows; run early morning/late night.
Prioritize far POIs first, closer ones on return.
Fly high and land on plateaus to scout first.
risks: Lower visibility at night still risky; storms may force holds
notes: Lower PvP density increases survival and retention.

strategies.title: Erythrite: Craft vs Sell
strategies.objective: Decide whether to convert Erythrite into cobalt paste for progression or sell raw when prices spike.
steps: Run the Hagga Rift loop and tally crystal yield.
If you’re close to mobility unlocks, craft paste.
If market surges, sell a portion to fund gear.
risks: Market swings; crafting locks value into your progression path
notes: Mobility upgrades can be worth more than short‑term Solari.

strategies.title: Dual‑Purpose: Intel + Vendor Loot
strategies.objective: When clearing outposts for Intel, prioritize salvage that vendors buy well.
steps: Favor enemies and crates with weapon/vehicle part drops.
Repair items with good stats to improve quotes.
Deliver Intel unlocks between sell runs.
risks: Overweight bags slow escapes on sand
notes: Combines progression currency with cash flow.

strategies.title: Storm Disengage
strategies.objective: Use oncoming storms to break line‑of‑sight and reset PvP.
steps: When visibility drops, pivot to pre‑marked rock shelter.
Heal and hydrate before re‑engaging.
Avoid dune crests where worms and enemies converge.
risks: Reduced visibility also hides enemies—move deliberately
notes: Terrain and weather are your best peel tools against groups.

strategies.title: Meta Checklist: Patch Shifts
strategies.objective: Refresh your loadout and routes after tier list or patch updates.
steps: Review current weapon tiers and shield behavior.
Re-test old routes for worm risk after changes.
Adjust Exchange listings for new demand.
risks: Inertia—don’t cling to obsolete builds
notes: Small respecs first; scale changes that prove out.

strategies.title: Hub Batch: Dailies + Vendor Run
strategies.objective: Batch hub errands: dailies, vendor sales, Exchange listing in one trip.
steps: Craft/repair first; then grab dailies/contracts.
Sell vendor items, list Exchange surplus, accept new contracts.
Return to base to refill and depart for loops.
risks: Camped hubs during peak hours
notes: Reduces wasted travel and keeps cash flowing.

strategies.title: PvP Pack Discipline
strategies.objective: Travel light in PvP zones to cap losses if wiped.
steps: Carry only what you need for the objective.
Stash excess water/consumables in vehicle or base.
Bank quickly after big wins.
risks: Under‑prepared if a fight drags; balance minimalism and readiness
notes: Loss caps protect long‑term progression.

strategies.title: Vendor Circuit Rotation
strategies.objective: Rotate through multiple vendors to compare buy quotes and offload loot efficiently.
steps: Pick a 3‑vendor loop near your hub
Sell category‑matched items where quotes are best
List any surplus on Exchange after the loop
risks: Travel time eats margins if poorly routed
notes: Keep a small stash unsold in case prices rise next loop.

strategies.title: Contract Triage
strategies.objective: Accept only contracts along your existing routes to avoid dead miles.
steps: Open the board after repairs
Filter by quadrant you already plan to visit
Drop any contract that drags you onto deep sand detours
risks: Overcommitting creates hydration risk
notes: Reward per minute rises when you avoid off‑route objectives.

strategies.title: Exchange Batch Listing
strategies.objective: Batch your listings to reduce time at terminals and improve pricing discipline.
steps: Sort inventory by stack value at base
List 4–6 items with clear price targets
Check sold/unsold next trip—adjust modestly
risks: Undercutting too hard tanks profits
notes: Batching minimizes temptation to panic‑reprice.

strategies.title: Salvage → Refine → Sell
strategies.objective: Refine low‑tier ores before selling to improve vendor value when markets are soft.
steps: Route salvage to ore refinery during downtime
Sell refined outputs at vendor‑favoring outposts
Keep some raw for crafts you actually need
risks: Fuel and time costs may offset gains
notes: Use when you’re already near refineries for other crafts.

strategies.title: Hub POI Pairing
strategies.objective: Pair two safe POIs near a hub for repeatable quick‑loot sessions.
steps: Identify two POIs on mostly‑rock routes
Loot fast; skip crates when vibration is elevated
Bank and repeat while you wait on crafts
risks: Lower loot ceiling than Deep Desert
notes: Great for gearing while learning worm timing.

strategies.title: Wreck Edge Crawl
strategies.objective: Circle the outer edge of wrecks from rock cover before committing to the interior.
steps: Park on a plateau; clear edge crates
Watch the meter; reset to rock between pulls
Enter interior only if safe and packs are light
risks: Campers may watch obvious entrances
notes: Edge first, interior second maximizes safe extraction.

strategies.title: Testing Station Windowing
strategies.objective: Time station visits during low‑traffic windows to reduce PvP risk.
steps: Run early morning/late night local time
Fly high; land on rock near exits
Leave if multiple teams converge
risks: Storms may force holds
notes: Lower traffic increases your extract rate.

strategies.title: Cache & Return
strategies.objective: Stash mid‑run loot at a safe plateau cache and return after finishing the route.
steps: Carry a small container for temporary stash
Mark the plateau on your map
Retrieve after finishing high‑value POIs
risks: Losing the cache in storms if poorly placed
notes: Travel lighter through risky interiors.

strategies.title: Camp/Scan Weave
strategies.objective: Weave camp clears with scan legs to keep Intel steady while crafts cook.
steps: Clear a camp
Run a scan chain on the way back
Start refines; repeat another camp
risks: Camp timers can respawn enemies behind you
notes: Balanced pacing avoids gear breakage and burnout.

strategies.title: Trainer Bundle with Intel
strategies.objective: Bundle trainer admission quests with Intel loops for efficient progression.
steps: Plot a loop touching trainer hubs
Complete short admission tasks
Clear nearby outposts on the return leg
risks: Overpacked loops risk dehydration
notes: Two currencies (skills/Intel) move together.

strategies.title: Unlock Priority Grid
strategies.objective: Prioritize unlocks that uncap throughput: power, water, storage, mobility.
steps: List bottlenecks before spending
Buy nodes you can craft today
Defer cosmetics until grid is stable
risks: Over‑unlocking without materials wastes time
notes: Throughput first, luxuries later.

strategies.title: Rock Ring Control
strategies.objective: Fight within a ring of rock exits to preserve disengage paths.
steps: Choose plateaus with multiple exit ramps
Kite enemies around the ring
Drop off the lee side to break LOS
risks: Storms may mask third parties
notes: Terrain wins more fights than raw DPS.

strategies.title: Bait & Break
strategies.objective: Bait opponents onto sand, then break contact back to rock.
steps: Feint toward a dune edge
When they follow, pivot to rock
Punish when their exits are poor
risks: Worm risk if you misjudge the meter
notes: Use sparingly; always keep a bailout.

strategies.title: Storm Veil
strategies.objective: Use incoming storms as a veil to rotate or disengage unnoticed.
steps: Rotate around objectives as visibility drops
Heal and reload behind cover
Re‑enter from a new angle
risks: You also lose visibility—move slow
notes: Excellent for breaking third‑party chains.

strategies.title: Duo Role Split
strategies.objective: Split roles in duos: one mobility scout, one anchor.
steps: Scout sets waypoints and checks choke points
Anchor holds rock edges and covers retreats
Swap roles when kits demand
risks: If both commit, exits vanish
notes: Role clarity beats mirror builds.

strategies.title: Grapple Lily Pads
strategies.objective: Set a sequence of grapple anchors across rock to minimize sand time.
steps: Mark anchor rocks
Practice consistent angles
Chain pulls only when hydration is healthy
risks: Missed anchors leave you stranded on sand
notes: Consistency beats speed on long crossings.

strategies.title: Plateau Scout
strategies.objective: Scout plateau landing zones before committing aircraft to an interior.
steps: Fly high; identify sheltered LZs
Land near a rock exit lane
Always have a second LZ marked
risks: Storms can close LZs unexpectedly
notes: Safe LZs shrink extract times.

strategies.title: Night Sip Discipline
strategies.objective: Sip water during night runs to extend range without overconsumption.
steps: Avoid sprinting unless crossing short sand patches
Refill before sunrise
Stash spare literjons in vehicle
risks: Under‑hydrating before fights backfires
notes: Night lowers heat but doesn’t remove worm risk.

strategies.title: Pad by Repair
strategies.objective: Place your vehicle pad next to repair to cut turnaround time.
steps: Align pad within immediate reach of station
Store welding wire in adjacent crate
Run a pre‑sortie inspection
risks: Tight layouts limit decor space
notes: Uptime matters more than aesthetics.

strategies.title: Module Rotation
strategies.objective: Rotate spare vehicle modules to keep uptime high.
steps: Keep one spare of the most‑worn module
Swap before deep desert legs
Repair spares between sorties
risks: Inventory pressure if hoarded
notes: Rotation beats running a module to zero.

strategies.title: Shield First Repairs
strategies.objective: Restore shielding and power lines first after storms.
steps: Bring console back online
Verify windtraps/cisterns
Resume crafts only after grid stability
risks: Restarting crafts too early causes stalls
notes: Production follows protection.

strategies.title: Cache at Exit
strategies.objective: Create a departure cache near your base exit for faster launches.
steps: Stock filters, fuel cells, repair kits
Refill literjons after each return
Audit cache every few runs
risks: Cache starvation if not maintained
notes: Reduces prep time and forgotten items.

strategies.title: Two‑Route Rule
strategies.objective: Always keep two exit routes when entering sand basins.
steps: Identify primary and secondary exits
Abort if either is compromised
Re‑engage only with clear lanes
risks: Storms can close both routes—hold position
notes: Simple rule that prevents chain wipes.

strategies.title: Light Retrieval Run
strategies.objective: Travel ultra‑light for retrieval to reduce time on sand.
steps: Carry only water, repair, and mobility
Use air if available
Prioritize irreplaceables
risks: Under‑gearing can lose fights en route
notes: Speed > haul on retrievals.

strategies.title: Camp First Aid
strategies.objective: Stabilize at a safe rock after a wipe before attempting recovery.
steps: Rebuild water and repairs
Scout with mobility
Retrieve in one decisive pass
risks: Waiting too long risks despawn/looters
notes: Don’t trickle in—commit once conditions are right.

strategies.title: Rotation Journal
strategies.objective: Keep a simple journal of profitable rotations to avoid relearning routes.
steps: Note time, route, yield, risks
Update after patches
Share with clanmates
risks: Bad notes waste time later
notes: Small habit, big payoff over weeks.

strategies.title: Hydration Checkpoints
strategies.objective: Set hydration checkpoints along long routes.
steps: Mark refill points on rock
Top off before big crossings
Abort if you’re below safe threshold
risks: Running dry mid‑basin forces risky sprints
notes: Checkpoints keep mistakes survivable.

strategies.title: Ammo Budgeting
strategies.objective: Pre‑craft a modest ammo buffer before camp clears.
steps: Craft in batches between sorties
Store near weapons fab
Carry a melee fallback
risks: Over‑weighting ammo slows travel
notes: Buffers prevent mid‑fight stalls.

strategies.title: Storm Hold Points
strategies.objective: Memorize safe hold points for common routes.
steps: Pick overhangs with rock exits
Avoid dunes during low visibility
Resume when meter calms
risks: Holding in the open invites wipes
notes: Holds cut losses during bad weather.

strategies.title: Vendor Day
strategies.objective: Dedicate one loop to selling and buying bottlenecks.
steps: Sort and repair first
Sell, then buy only what unblocks crafts
List extras on Exchange
risks: Market swings between loops
notes: Separating sell days prevents distractions on farm days.

strategies.title: Repair Before Logoff
strategies.objective: Repair gear and vehicles before logging off.
steps: Queue station repairs
Restock cache
Plan next route
risks: Forgetting means cold‑start next session
notes: Starts next session strong.
